author: kestral
long_description:
An interactive compass that will continuously point north when placed in one of the first eight slots of your inventory.

More immersive than the numerical display provided by F5 (debug info).

Compass textures are based on the ones tacotexmex created for ccompass, with his approval.

**Update:** Version 1.21 now with 16 directions instead of 12.
name: realcompass
short_description: A simple compass that only points north.
title: Real Compass
